entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
